sentences.sentence: Christians of all denominations attended the conference.
sentences.translation: 基督教所有教派的人都出席了这次会议。

sentences.sentence: She paid in cash, in bills of large denominations.
sentences.translation: 她用大面额钞票的现金支付。

sentences.sentence: Today there are more than 500m "revivalists" in the world (ie, members of Pentecostal denominations plus "charismatics" in traditional denominations).
sentences.translation: 今天，全世界有超过5亿“奋兴运动信仰者(revivalist)”——也即五旬节派加上传统教派中的“灵恩”派。
